info.title: generated mu-cl-resources api
info.description: API generated from mu-cl-resources for a specific domain

get.description: Provides the listing of resources of type schema-analysis-job
Retrieves resource of type schema-analysis-job
Lists columns relationship.   Contains results for links named columns of mu-cl-resource type columns, coming from resource of mu-cl-resources type schema-analysis-jobs.

200.description: An array of instances of columns

links.description: provides relevant links to fetch and update the relationship

self.description: a link for the relationship itself (a "relationship link"). This link allows the client to directly manipulate the relationship.

related.description: A "related resource link" provides access to resource objects linked in a relationship. When fetched, the related resource object(s) are returned as the response’s primary data.
